block.refinedstorage2.64b_fluid_storage_: Bloque de almacenamiento de fluidos de 64B
block.refinedstorage2.256b_fluid_storage: Bloque de almacenamiento de fluidos de 64B
block.refinedstorage2.1024b_fluid_storag: Bloque de almacenamiento de fluidos de 1024B
block.refinedstorage2.4096b_fluid_storag: Bloque de almacenamiento de fluidos de 4096B
block.refinedstorage2.creative_fluid_sto: Bloque de almacenamiento de fluidos creativo
gui.refinedstorage2.controller.redstone_: Cuando este dispositivo está inactivo, la red de almacenamiento no podrá utilizar este dispositivo como fuente de energía.
gui.refinedstorage2.storage.redstone_mod: Cuando este dispositivo está inactivo, ya no se podrá acceder al almacenamiento contenido desde la red de almacenamiento.
gui.refinedstorage2.storage.filter_help: Los recursos que pueden o no ser permitidos en este almacenamiento, dependiendo de si el dispositivo está en la lista de permitidos o en el modo de lista de bloqueos.
Sin filtros configurados, no se aceptarán recursos en este almacenamiento.
Sólo permitir recursos en este almacenamiento que estén configurados en los filtros.
No permitir recursos en este almacenamiento que están configurados en los filtros.
gui.refinedstorage2.grid.auto_selected.h: Si seleccionar automáticamente el cuadro de búsqueda al abrir el cuadrículo.
gui.refinedstorage2.grid.synchronizer.of: No sincronizar el texto del cuadro de búsqueda.
gui.refinedstorage2.grid.synchronizer.je: Sincroniza el texto del cuadro de búsqueda al filtro JEI.
Sincronice el texto del cuadro de búsqueda al filtro JEI, y el filtro JEI al texto del cuadro de búsqueda.
gui.refinedstorage2.grid.synchronizer.re: Sincroniza el texto del cuadro de búsqueda al filtro REI.
Sincronice el texto del cuadro de búsqueda al filtro JEI, y el filtro JEI al texto del cuadro de búsqueda.
gui.refinedstorage2.detector.mode.under: Emit redstone signal when under the amount
gui.refinedstorage2.detector.mode.equal: Emit redstone signal when on the amount
gui.refinedstorage2.detector.mode.above: Emit redstone signal when above the amount
gui.refinedstorage2.detector.filter_help: The resource that should be detected in the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage2.destructor.filter_he: The blocks that may or may not be destroyed, depending if the device is in allowlist or blocklist mode.
gui.refinedstorage2.destructor.filter_mo: Only allow blocks into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow blocks into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage2.constructor.drop_ite: Drop items instead of placing blocks
gui.refinedstorage2.constructor.filter_h: The resources that should be placed from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage2.interface.filter_hel: The resources that should be exported from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage2.exporter.filter_help: The resources that should be exported from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage2.importer.filter_help: The resources that may be imported from the target inventory.
gui.refinedstorage2.importer.filter_mode: Only allow resources into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow resources into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage2.redstone_mode.ignore: This device will always be active, regardless of redstone signal.
gui.refinedstorage2.redstone_mode.high.h: This device will only be active with a redstone signal.
gui.refinedstorage2.redstone_mode.low.he: This device will only be active without a redstone signal.
gui.refinedstorage2.priority.storage_hel: The order in which the storage network will insert or extract resources, highest-first.
gui.refinedstorage2.fuzzy_mode.on.storag: Match the filters for the allowlist or blocklist exactly.
gui.refinedstorage2.fuzzy_mode.on.extrac: Match the filters when extracting from the storage network exactly.
Match the filters when extracting from the source exactly.
gui.refinedstorage2.fuzzy_mode.off.stora: Match the filters for the allowlist or blocklist without comparing NBT tags.
gui.refinedstorage2.fuzzy_mode.off.gener: Match the filter without comparing NBT tags.
gui.refinedstorage2.fuzzy_mode.off.extra: Match the filters when extracting from the storage network without comparing NBT tags.
Match the filters when extracting from the source without comparing NBT tags.
gui.refinedstorage2.access_mode.insert_e: The storage network will be able to insert or extract from this storage.
gui.refinedstorage2.access_mode.insert.h: The storage network will only be able to insert into this storage. Contained resources will still be visible in a Grid.
The storage network will only be able to extract from this storage.
gui.refinedstorage2.void_excess.help: When void excess mode is turned on and the storage is full, it will keep accepting resources but void them.
gui.refinedstorage2.void_excess.allowlis: Void excess will only work when the storage is in allowlist mode.
gui.refinedstorage2.regulator_upgrade.fi: The resource that should be regulated in the target.
item.refinedstorage2.controller.help: Provides the storage network with energy. Multiple are allowed in a single storage network.
item.refinedstorage2.creative_controller: Provides the storage network with an infinite source of energy.
item.refinedstorage2.disk_drive.help: Accepts storage disks to provide the storage network with storage space.
item.refinedstorage2.grid.help: Allows for interacting with the storage network.
item.refinedstorage2.crafting_grid.help: Allows for interacting with the storage network, with crafting abilities.
item.refinedstorage2.importer.help: Imports resources from an external source to the storage network.
item.refinedstorage2.exporter.help: Exports resources from the storage network to an external destination.
item.refinedstorage2.interface.help: Acts as the combination of an Importer and Exporter.
item.refinedstorage2.external_storage.he: Provides the storage network with storage from an external source.
item.refinedstorage2.detector.help: Emits a redstone signal if the storage network contains a resource equal, above or under a given amount.
item.refinedstorage2.constructor.help: Places blocks from the storage network in the world.
item.refinedstorage2.destructor.help: Destroys blocks from the world and puts them in the storage network.
item.refinedstorage2.wrench.helper: Use to rotate blocks or press SHIFT and use to dismantle Refined Storage blocks.
item.refinedstorage2.regulator_upgrade.h: In an Exporter, will only export if the amount in the target is less than configured in the upgrade. In an Importer, will only import if the amount in the target is more than configured in the upgrade. Use item to configure.
item.refinedstorage2.wireless_transmitte: Provides wireless network access for items like the Wireless Grid. Multiple are allowed in an area for wider coverage.
item.refinedstorage2.network_item.unboun: Use on any storage network device to bind.
item.refinedstorage2.network_item.cannot: There is more than one %s in your inventory.
There isn't any %s in your inventory.
Cannot apply configuration card to different type of device. It is configured for %s.
Use on a storage network device while crouching to copy its configuration and upgrades to the card.
Use on the destination storage network device while crouching to transfer the configuration and upgrades. Use while crouching to clear.
item.refinedstorage2.network_card.unboun: Use while crouching on a Network Receiver.
item.refinedstorage2.network_card.bound_: Insert into a Network Transmitter. Use while crouching to clear binding.
key.refinedstorage2.clear_crafting_grid_: Clear Crafting Grid matrix to network
Clear Crafting Grid matrix to inventory
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage2.title: Refined Storage 2
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage2.option.g: Maximum amount of rows when stretched
Prevent sorting while SHIFT is down
advancements.refinedstorage2.root.descri: Use one or multiple Controllers in a network to provide your network with energy
Use Cable to connect devices with each other, or place devices against each other
advancements.refinedstorage2.drives.desc: Craft a Disk Drive to be able to store your storage disks
advancements.refinedstorage2.storing_ite: Craft a Storage Disk and put it in your Disk Drive
advancements.refinedstorage2.viewing_you: Craft a Grid to interact with your storage
advancements.refinedstorage2.upgrading_y: Upgrade your Grid to a Crafting Grid to get crafting abilities
advancements.refinedstorage2.storing_flu: Craft a Fluid Storage Disk and put it in your Disk Drive
advancements.refinedstorage2.importing.d: Get resources into the storage network with an Importer
advancements.refinedstorage2.exporting.d: Get resources out of the storage network with an Exporter
advancements.refinedstorage2.upgrading.d: Craft an Upgrade to improve various devices
advancements.refinedstorage2.interface_t: Export and import items at the same time with an Interface
advancements.refinedstorage2.storing_ext: Use an External Storage to provide the network with storage from an external block like a chest
advancements.refinedstorage2.detecting.d: Use redstone to check resources stored in the network
advancements.refinedstorage2.constructio: Get blocks from the storage network into the world with a Constructor
advancements.refinedstorage2.destruction: Get blocks from in the world into the storage network with a Destructor
advancements.refinedstorage2.wireless.de: Access your resources wirelessly with a Wireless Grid.
advancements.refinedstorage2.better_than: Craft a Storage Monitor to view, insert or extract resources in a storage network
advancements.refinedstorage2.no_cables_r: Add extra components to your network without using cables by using a Network Transmitter, Network Receiver and Network Card
advancements.refinedstorage2.portable_st: Craft a Portable Grid to access the content of disks without requiring a storage network
